Uses of Class
zebra4j.Question

  • Packages that use Question 
    Package Description
    zebra4j
    zebra4j is a generator and solver for Zebra puzzles, a type of "logic grid puzzles".

    • Uses of Question in zebra4j

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Question Question.NAME_OF_CRIMINAL
      Sample question: Who is the criminal?

      static Question Question.generate(PuzzleSolution solution)
      Generates a random question about the people in the given solution
      Question QuestionPuzzle.getQuestion()
      A question about the people and their attributes, defined in the underlying basic puzzle.
      Constructors in zebra4j with parameters of type Question
